revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 60:;(Pachon) 4 likewise:;Helene, daughter of Hieranouphis (Ptollas, son of Touamabis);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 12) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Isarion, drachmas 12;;Neilos, son of Lupus, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarion, drachmas 12;;Herakles, son of Petheus, grandson of Onnophris, mother Taseus, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 44 obols 12.;(Pachon) 11 likewise:;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Phaesis, mother Tapasion, drachmas 20;;Petheus, son of Hatres (Deios, son of Panpis);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 2) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 2.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obl 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obols 4.5;;Onnophris, son of Petheus (Chairemon, son of Pateis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 10 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 3.5, naubion drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharge drachmas 2 obols 4.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 52 obols 16) eparourion drachmas 7 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 4, kollybos obols 2.5, in total drachmas 24 obols 3.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 27 obol 0.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 4 chalki 2, in total drachmas 28 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;Komon, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, drachmas 32;;Pasion his brother with the same mother , drachmas 32;;Heron, son of Achillas, grandson of Onnophris, mother Didymarion, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Onnopris (Psas);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 5 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obol 1.5;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year chalki 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, obols 0.5 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 164 obols 26;;(Pachon) 12 likewise:;Gaius Julius Saturnilus through the agency of Sarapion (Neilos, physician);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 30 obol 1.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 5 obol 1.5 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 5 obol 0.5, surcharges drachmas 7 obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 23 obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5.5 chalki 2, kollybos drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 100) naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 2.5;;on land plots in release likewise obols 3.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5.5;;grammateia obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, in total obols obols 2 chalki 2;;Sopatra, daughter of Maron;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 10, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 2.5, naubion drachma 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 3.5, kollybos obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 22 obols 3 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
